00046     function pfw ()
00047     {
00048         $this->filter =   new filter();
00049         $this->nat =        new nat();
00050         $this->macro =    new macro();
00051         $this->scrub =    new scrub();
00052         $this->table =    new table();
00053         $this->altq =       new altq();
00054         $this->queue =    new queue();
00055         $this->options =  new options();
00056         $this->anchor =   new anchor();
00057     }
00058 
00059     function read_from_file ($filename)
00060     {
00061         $this->parseRulebase(file_get_contents ($filename));
00062     }
00063 
00064     function parseRulebase ($rulebase_string)
00065     {
00066         if (preg_match("/pf ruleset generated at/", $rulebase_string)) {
00067             $rulebase_string = substr($rulebase_string, strpos($rulebase_string, "#\n\n") + '3');
00068         }
00069         $rulebase_string = preg_replace  ("/\n#/", "\n# ", $rulebase_string);
00070         $rulebase_string = str_replace ("\\\n", "", $rulebase_string);
00071         foreach (preg_split("/\n/", $rulebase_string, '-1', PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY) as $rule) {
00072             $this->rulebase[] = trim($rule);
00073         }
00074         foreach ($this->rulebase as $rule) {
00075             $keywords = preg_split("/[\s,\t]+/", $rule, '-1', PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
00076             if (preg_match("/match.*\bscrub\b/", $rule)) {
00077                 $keywords[0] = 'scrub';
00078             }
00079             switch ($keywords['0']) {
00080             case "":
00081                 break;
00082             case "#":
00083                 if (!isset($_comment)) {
00084                     $_comment = trim(substr($rule, '1'));
00085                 } else {
00086                     $_comment .= "\n". trim(substr($rule, '1'));
00087                 }
00088                 break;
00089             case "anchor":
00090             case "pass":
00091             case "block":
00092             case "match":
00093             case "antispoof":
00094                 $this->filter->addComment($_comment);
00095                 unset($_comment);
00096                 $this->filter->rules[] = $this->filter->parse($rule);
00097                 break;
00098             case "no":
00099             case "rdr":
00100             case "nat":
00101             case "binat":
00102             case "nat-anchor":
00103             case "rdr-anchor":
00104             case "binat-anchor":
00105                 if (isset($_comment)) {
00106                     $data['type'] = "comment";
00107                     $data['comment'] = $_comment;
00108                     $this->nat->rules[] = $data;
00109                     unset ($_comment);
00110                 }
00111                 $this->nat->rules[] = $this->nat->parse($rule);
00112                 break;
00113             case "set":
00114                 $this->options->addComment($_comment);
00115                 unset ($_comment);
00116                 $this->options->parse($rule);
00117                 break;
00118             case "scrub":
00119                 if (isset($_comment)) {
00120                     $data['type'] = "comment";
00121                     $data['comment'] = $_comment;
00122                     $this->scrub->rules[] = $data;
00123                     unset ($_comment);
00124                 }
00125                 $this->scrub->rules[] = $this->scrub->parse($rule);
00126                 unset ($_comment);
00127                 break;
00128             case "table":
00129                 if (isset($_comment)) {
00130                     $data['type'] = "comment";
00131                     $data['comment'] = $_comment;
00132                     $this->table->rules[] = $data;
00133                     unset ($_comment);
00134                 }
00135                 $this->table->rules[] = $this->table->parse($rule);
00136                 unset ($_comment);
00137                 break;
00138             case "altq":
00139                 if (isset($_comment)) {
00140                     $data['type'] = "comment";
00141                     $data['comment'] = $_comment;
00142                     $this->altq->rules[] = $data;
00143                     unset ($_comment);
00144                 }
00145                 $this->altq->rules[] = $this->altq->parse($rule);
00146                 break;
00147             case "queue":
00148                 if (isset($_comment)) {
00149                     $data['type'] = "comment";
00150                     $data['comment'] = $_comment;
00151                     $this->queue->rules[] = $data;
00152                     unset ($_comment);
00153                 }
00154                 $this->queue->rules[] = $this->queue->parse($rule);
00155                 break;
00156             case "load":
00157             if (isset($_comment)) {
00158                 $data['type'] = "comment";
00159                 $data['comment'] = $_comment;
00160                 $this->anchor->rules[] = $data;
00161                 unset ($_comment);
00162             }
00163             $this->anchor->rules[] = $this->anchor->parse($rule);
00164             break;
00165             default:
00166                 if (isset($_comment)) {
00167                     $data['type'] = "comment";
00168                     $data['comment'] = $_comment;
00169                     $this->macro->rules[] = $data;
00170                     unset ($_comment);
00171                 }
00172                 $this->macro->rules[] = $this->macro->parse($rule);
00173                 break;
00174             }
00175         }
00176         $this->rulebase = $rules;
00177     }
00178 
00179 
00180     function generate ($lines = false, $generate_header = true)
00181     {
00182       if ($generate_header) {
00183           $data = "#\n# pf ruleset generated at ". date("Y-m-d H:m:s"). "\n#\n# ruleset automatically generated by pfw\n#\n\n";
00184         }
00185 
00186         $data .= $this->macro->generate();
00187         $data .= $this->table->generate();
00188         $data .= $this->options->generate();
00189         $data .= $this->scrub->generate();
00190         $data .= $this->altq->generate();
00191         $data .= $this->queue->generate();
00192         $data .= $this->nat->generate();
00193         $data .= $this->filter->generate();
00194         $data .= $this->anchor->generate();
00195 
00196     if ($generate_header) {
00197           $data .= "\n# End of Ruleset\n";
00198         }
00199         if ($lines) {
00200             $linenumber='1';
00201             foreach (explode("\n", $data) as $line) {
00202                 $_data .= $linenumber++. ": $line\n";
00203             }
00204             $data = $_data;
00205         }
00206         return $data;
00207     }
00208 
00209     function writeFile ($filename)
00210     {
00211         if (!$handle = fopen($filename, 'w')) {
00212             print "Cannot open file: $filename";
00213             exit;
00214         }
00215         
00216         // Write $somecontent to our opened file.
00217         if (fwrite($handle, $this->generate()) === FALSE) {
00218             print "Cannot write to file ($filename)";
00219             exit;
00220         }
00221         
00222         fclose ($handle);
00223     }
00224 
00225     function printRules ()
00226     {
00227         print_r ($this->rulebase);
00228     }
00229 }
